00024 #include "Base64.hpp"
00025 #include "unit.hpp"

00027 #include <vector>

00030 
00031 using namespace std;
00032 using namespace pwiz::util;
00033 
00034 
00035 ostream* os_ = 0;
00036 
00037 
00038 struct TestPair
00039 {
00040     const char* binary;
00041     const char* text;
00042 };
00043 
00044 
00045 TestPair testPairs_[] = 
00046 {
00047     {"", ""},
00048     {"A", "QQ=="},
00049     {"AB", "QUI="},
00050     {"ABC", "QUJD"},
00051     {"The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog.", 
00052         "VGhlIHF1aWNrIGJyb3duIGZveCBqdW1wZWQgb3ZlciB0aGUgbGF6eSBkb2cu"},
00053     {"Darren", "RGFycmVu"},
00054 };
00055 
00056 
00057 const int testPairCount_ = sizeof(testPairs_)/sizeof(TestPair);
00058 
00059 
00060 void checkTestPair(const TestPair& testPair)
00061 {
00062     const string& from = testPair.binary;
00063     const string& to = testPair.text;
00064     if (os_) *os_ << from << " <--> " << to << endl;
00065 
00066     // convert binary -> text
00067     vector<char> textBuffer;
00068     textBuffer.resize(Base64::binaryToTextSize(from.size()) + 1, '\0');
00069     size_t textCount = Base64::binaryToText(from.c_str(), from.size(), &textBuffer[0]);
00070 
00071     // verify binary -> text
00072     string textString = !textBuffer.empty() ? &textBuffer[0] : "";
00073     unit_assert(textCount == (unsigned int)to.size());
00074     unit_assert(textString == to);
00075 
00076     // convert text -> binary
00077     vector<char> binaryBuffer;
00078     binaryBuffer.resize(Base64::textToBinarySize(to.size()) + 1, '\0');
00079     size_t binaryCount = Base64::textToBinary(to.c_str(), to.size(), &binaryBuffer[0]);
00080 
00081     // verify text -> binary
00082     string binaryString = !binaryBuffer.empty() ? &binaryBuffer[0] : "";
00083     unit_assert(binaryCount == (unsigned int)from.size());
00084     unit_assert(binaryString == from);
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 void test256()
00089 {
00090     if (os_) *os_ << "test256()\n" << flush;
00091 
00092     // chars from 0 to 255
00093     vector<char> from(256);
00094     for (int i=0; i<256; i++)
00095         from[i] = (char)i;
00096 
00097     char to[] = "AAECAwQFBgcICQoLDA0ODxAREhMUFRYXGBkaGxwdHh8gISIj"
00098                 "JCUmJygpKissLS4vMDEyMzQ1Njc4OTo7PD0+P0BBQkNERUZH"
00099                 "SElKS0xNTk9QUVJTVFVWV1hZWltcXV5fYGFiY2RlZmdoaWpr"
00100                 "bG1ub3BxcnN0dXZ3eHl6e3x9fn+AgYKDhIWGh4iJiouMjY6P"
00101                 "kJGSk5SVlpeYmZqbnJ2en6ChoqOkpaanqKmqq6ytrq+wsbKz"
00102                 "tLW2t7i5uru8vb6/wMHCw8TFxsfIycrLzM3Oz9DR0tPU1dbX"
00103                 "2Nna29zd3t/g4eLj5OXm5+jp6uvs7e7v8PHy8/T19vf4+fr7"
00104                 "/P3+/w==";
00105 
00106     // convert binary -> text
00107     vector<char> textBuffer;
00108     textBuffer.resize(Base64::binaryToTextSize(from.size()) + 1, '\0');
00109     size_t textCount = Base64::binaryToText(&from[0], 256, &textBuffer[0]);
00110     textBuffer[textCount] = '\0';
00111     unit_assert(textCount == (unsigned int)strlen(to));
00112     unit_assert(!strcmp(to, &textBuffer[0])); 
00113 
00114     // convert text -> binary
00115     vector<char> binaryBuffer;
00116     binaryBuffer.resize(300);
00117     size_t binaryCount = Base64::textToBinary(to, strlen(to), &binaryBuffer[0]);
00118     unit_assert(binaryCount == 256);
00119     for (int i=0; i<256; i++)
00120         unit_assert(binaryBuffer[i] == from[i]);
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 void test()
00125 {
00126     for_each(testPairs_, testPairs_+testPairCount_, checkTestPair);
00127     test256();
00128 }
00129

00131 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00132 {
00133     try
00134     {
00135         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) // verbose
00136             os_ = &cout;
00137 
00138         if (os_) *os_ << "Base64Test\n";
00139         
00140         test();
00141         return 0;
00142     }
00143     catch (exception& e)
00144     {
00145         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00146         return 1;
00147     }
00148 }
